title: Colin Farrell & Brendan Gleeson | A Bridge Over Troubled Borders
description:
The biggest stories over the weekend were the explosion on Russia’s bridge to Crimea and Kanye West’s disastrous return to Twitter. In other disaster news, Senate candidate Dr. Oz gave a campaign speech while standing in front of a car once owned by Adolf Hitler. And guests Colin Farrell and Brendan Gleeson play close friends whose relationship is unraveling in their new film, but in real life they can’t imagine being at odds with each other. Check out their film, “The Banshees of Inisherin,” in theaters next Friday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
